name: MEC Fast Track Rolling 40L Carry On - Unisex
description:
Roll smoothly and quietly, with a bit of low-key elegance. The much-loved Fast Track Rolling Carry On features streamlined moulding and padded tub-style panels that extend up the sides for extra protection. Large, rugged wheels make for rumble-free transit. At 40L, it has enough space for 3 to 5 days of clothing, but it still meets most carry-on size restrictions so you won't have to wait for your bag at your destination.Made of polyester with a PU coating and a DWR finish for excellent water resistance.Burly 1000-denier high-tenacity polyester in high-wear areas adds durability.Reinforced honeycomb plastic tub base and 3mm foam lining throughout bag provide protection from bumps and drops.Lockable zippers on the main compartment keep your stuff secure.Large internal zippered mesh pocket and cinch straps keep you organized.External zippered pocket with key clip holds quick-access items.Business card/ID label slot ensures you pull the right bag out of the overhead bin.Push-button telescoping pull handle.80mm wheels are rugged polypropylene and polyurethane.Fabric grab handles on side and top for moving onto buses or conveyor belts.Heavy-duty plastic kick plate on bottom stands up to the rigours of travel.Nests inside the Fast Track Rolling 60L bag (sold separately) for easy storage.

        Sustainability
